snippet: Wall Street shares rose despite an unexpected rise in initial jobless claims in the latest week.
abstract: Encouraging signs from China and Europe drive the Dow Jones industrial average up 181 points, one of the biggest gains of the year.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street shares rose despite an unexpected rise in initial jobless claims in the latest week.

headline.main: Shares Surge on News From China and Europe
headline.print_headline: Shares Surge on News From China and Europe
